page.title: 03Tourist Attractions.
page.content: The main tourist attractions in our area are the scenery,St.Mary's Church, Grantully Castle and the River Tay. {The Tay}is also a great attraction for canoeists.They have huts at Grandtully Bridge and so this is the main spot you will see them. {Grantully Castle}is also quite famous but only the grounds of the castle are open to the public once a year.The castle itself is never open to the public. {St.Mary's Church}is an old and very small church.The main attraction to it is that it has a painted ceiling which is very rare in this country. Our area is also very good for hill walking. Most of our hills are covered in trees or moorland or rough grassland.
